pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calculate Pesticide Risk Metric (PRM) Values from Multiple Pesticides...Calc Them All // Contains functions which can be used to calculate Pesticide Risk Metric values in aquatic environments from concentrations of multiple pesticides with known species sensitive distributions (SSDs). Pesticides provided by this package have all be validated however if the user has their own pesticides with SSD values they can append them to the pesticide_info table to include them in estimates.
